text: Dryopteris nigropaleacea is a species of perennial leptosporangiate fern endemic to parts of Afghanistan, Pakistan, western Nepal, and Himachal Pradesh and Uttar Pradesh in India. ==Synonyms== * Dryopteris juxtaposita subsp. nigropaleacea (Fraser-Jenk.) Khullar * Dryopteris pallida subsp. nigropaleacea Fraser-Jenk. ==External links== Fraser-Jenk., 1982 In: Bol. Soc. Broter. 55: 238 World Ferns: Checklist of Ferns and Lycophytes of the World nigropaleacea
title: Dryopteris nigropaleacea
